# IKRig.Joint.LimitsDefinition

**Structure**

A definition of joint rotation limits.

## Declaration

```swift
struct LimitsDefinition
```

## Overview

Limit angles are defined as relative to the rest pose.



## Initializers

- **init(weight:boneAxis:minimumAngles:maximumAngles:)**: Creates a joint limits definition.

## Instance Properties

- **boneAxis**: The axis around which the bone twists.
- **maximumAngles**: The positive delta from the rest pose per-axis in radians.
- **minimumAngles**: The negative delta from the rest pose per-axis in radians.
- **weight**: The weight of the joint rotation limit demand.

## Enumerations

- **IKRig.Joint.LimitsDefinition.Axis**

items.description: The axis around which the bone twists.
items.name: boneAxis

items.description: The positive delta from the rest pose per-axis in radians.
items.name: maximumAngles
